```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# load necessary libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(lubridate)

# load data

# table with review subset, including product type, user id, score, length, etc. 
reviews <- read.table("https://codowd.com/bigdata/hw1/Review_subset.csv",
                      sep = " ", header = F, stringsAsFactors = F)
# list of product types
products <- read.table("https://codowd.com/bigdata/hw1/products.csv",
                       sep = " ", header = F, stringsAsFactors = F)
# simple triplet matrix of word counts from the review text 
# (identified by ReviewID and WordID)
word_freq <- read.table("https://codowd.com/bigdata/hw1/word_freq.csv",
                        sep = " ", header = F, stringsAsFactors = F)
# 1125 alphabetically ordered words that occur in the reviews
words <- read.table("https://codowd.com/bigdata/hw1/words.csv",
                    sep = " ", header = F, stringsAsFactors = F)

# set option chunks
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE
  )
```
